markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1545) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1514)

**Requirements**
You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon. While you are in this stance, you constantly have the benefits of [Dueling Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1514).
name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
requirement: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
